SkillDescription: Heals a certain amount of HP
Deals a certain amount of damage
Half the enemy damage for 5 turns
10HP + 2*(Number of correct answers in phase 1) for 3 turns
Reduce Damage of enemy to half for 3 turns
Sacrifice 15 HP to increase Base damage by 10 for the next 2 turns
Reduce Base Damage by 3 and in exchange, add +3 Gp gain for the next 5 turns
If enemy is activating skill that is ongoing for more than 3 turns, deal 45 damage
